mapper.update:
update project_evaluation
project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
engineering_type = #{engineeringType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
evaluation_status = #{evaluationStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_status = #{projectStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
winning_bid = #{winningBid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
effective_income = #{effectiveIncome,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
is_sign = #{isSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sign_time = #{signTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
contract_start_time = #{contractStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
contract_end_time = #{contractEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
duration = #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER},
evaluation_time = #{evaluationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
evaluation_benefit = #{evaluationBenefit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
evaluation_cost = #{evaluationCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
evaluation_code = #{evaluationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
evaluation_annex = #{evaluationAnnex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
joint_hearing_benefit = #{jointHearingBenefit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
joint_hearing_cost = #{jointHearingCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
joint_hearing_time = #{jointHearingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
joint_hearing_annex = #{jointHearingAnnex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
responsibility_benefiy = #{responsibilityBenefiy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
responsibility_time = #{responsibilityTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
responsibility_people = #{responsibilityPeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
responsibility_secretary = #{responsibilitySecretary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
responsibility_annex = #{responsibilityAnnex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime},
create_user = #{createUser},
update_time = #{updateTime},
update_user = #{updateUser},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update project_evaluation set project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, engineering_type = #{engineeringType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, evaluation_status = #{evaluationStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_status = #{projectStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, winning_bid = #{winningBid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, effective_income = #{effectiveIncome,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, is_sign = #{isSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sign_time = #{signTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, contract_start_time = #{contractStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, contract_end_time = #{contractEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, duration = #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, evaluation_time = #{evaluationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, evaluation_benefit = #{evaluationBenefit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, evaluation_cost = #{evaluationCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, evaluation_code = #{evaluationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, evaluation_annex = #{evaluationAnnex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, joint_hearing_benefit = #{jointHearingBenefit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, joint_hearing_cost = #{jointHearingCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, joint_hearing_time = #{jointHearingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, joint_hearing_annex = #{jointHearingAnnex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, responsibility_benefiy = #{responsibilityBenefiy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, responsibility_time = #{responsibilityTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, responsibility_people = #{responsibilityPeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, responsibility_secretary = #{responsibilitySecretary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, responsibility_annex = #{responsibilityAnnex,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT pe.*,p.name AS projectName,cu.name AS createUserStr,uu.name AS updateUserStr FROM project_evaluation pe LEFT JOIN project p ON pe.project_id = p.id LEFT JOIN `user` cu ON pe.create_user = cu.id LEFT JOIN `user` uu ON pe.update_user = uu.id WHERE pe.id = #{id}
